game was good but then the realm beyond happened and it just went downhill from there. I have never seen a dev team change so much shit that nobody asks for.

up until patch 6.1.0 the game had a really long and tedious grind that took me nearly two thousand hours to unlock all of the survivor perks which before allowed you to then find the perk in another characters bloodweb which took even more playtime to get the perks I wanted on other characters I wanted to play. It took me over 4000 hours to get every survivor prestige 3 level 50 prior to 6.1.0 which reduced the grind by 75%. The reason i'm bringing this up is because of the horrible reward BHVR decided to give us for spending countless hours getting our characters to prestige 3. The reward is a "Legacy Character Portrait" which is a little effect that plays over your characters portrait in the menu. The reason I say that the reward is bad is because not only am I the only one that can see the reward, but its not even remotely as good of a reward to those who played back in 2016 and received legacy cosmetics for the original characters. Thats not me saying that I think BHVR should give us legacy either because I don't, that wouldn't be fair to those who had a way worse grind back in 2016. What i'm saying is that we should've at least have been given something that we can show to others, didn't have to be a cosmetic, but it could've been something better than a character portrait that only the person who earned it can see.

Let me tell u something about this game. 
I love this game, which is why I have played this game for way too long. But there are many things I have to mention, that have been going in the wrong direction in my opinion. 

[b]
Ranking system
[/b]
In the early days  getting to red ranks or rank 1 even (the highest rank you can achieve) was a mile stone and an accomplishment. Through the years the devs added additional scoring events that contribute towards your game score, which establishes if u rank up, rank down or mentain your rank. This has lead to point, where, if u have played enough in a season (13th to 13th) there is nothing keeping u from reaching red ranks or even rank 1, Which means no matter how good you are, you can't rank better than 1 and are matched with people, who have a couple hundred hours or even less. If u have played this game long enough: There is nothing more frustration than watching inexperienced survivors throwing valuable pallets after getting hit, which is one of the single greatest mistake u can do in this game. You could consider pallets, which, if survivors use them wisly, gain them time in order to do the 5 gens necessary to escape. The only time this ranking doesn't suck, is, when u play with your swf buddies, where you do the ranking for the game and most of the time it is not balanced.

[b]
Balancing
[/b]

The game has been out for 4 years + and since then some features got a change, whereas others did not. 
[list]
[*] Most notably keys. The problem I have with keys, is even though survivors only manage to do 3 out of 5 gens and the killer dominates them, the last 2 can escape through the hatch, without needing to do anything in the game. 
[*] A different topic are Moris (which did get changed once if im not mistaken). The ability to get one out of the game early is huge for the killer in order to win and way too powerful and yet they leave it as it is.
[*] Another point is map offerings. Some maps like Ormond or Coldwind Farm are often chosen by survivors obviously, because these maps definately favour them. The same goes for killer. 
[*] there are many very underwhealming / beginner perks and only a few considerable perks on killer and survivor
[/list]

The actors should never have the possibility to choose whether they go to a map that gives them an adventage over the other side without it heavily being accounted for in the ranking system. 

 [b]
Programming
[/b]

All I am asking for a game like this is "IT BEING CONSISTANT". A few examples:

[list]
[*] being hit through windows that normally would not have hit if it wasn't for the killers high ping 
[*] getting stuck on stairs when hugging the wall for no apparent reason (invisable struckture that stands out and u get stuck on, i assume)
[*] getting matched with survivors, who in theory know what to do and use their brain in chases at least to the slimmest extent
[*] grabing survivors from gens / lockers / totems fail, because of latency (I wonder how other games cope with latency issues like this)
[*] Survivor lobbies crash multiple times per hour because of an "Unknown Error", which apparently is known enough to be unknown 
[*] billy chainsaw stops before hitting a survivor (phantom billy chainsaw hit). Exists since 2016 if im not mistaken
[*] huntress' axes sometimes pass you and hit you and sometimes they go straight through you and don't hit 
[*] hutress' hitboxes being cylindrical whereas deathslinger's is almost perfectly shaped
[/list] 

 [b]
Graphic Update
[/b]

To top it of, instead of fixing all those issues, they decide to rework the maps graphicly, which, don't get me wrong, I appreciate, but tbh, the reworked Yamaoka maps don't really look that great compared to the reworked Preschool maps. I am under the impression that this "grafic update" is rather an attempt to solve fps / performance issues on console and sell it as a grafical update. 

To conclude this, I rather have a new chapter every 4 or 5, hell even 6 months if the other, in my opinion, more relevant issues get adressed and fixed.

Instead of fixing  glitches and hit boxes (which a normal dev team would) they have decided to change all animations and the HUD to make the game look worse. Killer's and survivors are still balanced tho especially because they have nerfed moris (killlers) and not nerfed keys (survivors) which means its fair. Also they have nerfed instant heals on survivors but havent nerfed addons on killers (such as iridescent head) which 1 taps survivors. ;) SHEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEESH

Play as Survivor if you like:
Jumping from frights and scares
Being sneaky and stealthy
Managing to lose people who are chasing you
Pressure of time restraint
Saving other survivors

Play as a Killer if you like:
Chasing people down
Hacking people up
Putting people on hooks
Catching people
Out thinking people who are trying to trick you

A thing to remember for this game: As a Survivor, you are not bad at it, or failing, if you get caught by the killer, or knocked. It's all a part of the game. More often you will die, less often you will escape. As a Killer, you are not bad at it, or failing, if survivors escape, or get unhooked, it's all part of the game. In fact, you want the survivors to get unhooked as that means you may find them, and chase them again, and you get a lot of points for chasing them. If you let them die on the hook without letting them be rescued, you won;t get as many points.

It is very thrilling, a lot of fun, and if you're playing as Survivor i recommend playing with friends as it adds more hilarity.

来说说吧，玩了一百多小时了，首先是匹配机制，这个游戏的匹配机制非常不平衡，尤其是晚上，通常白段可以匹配到绿段紫段甚至是红段，拿我来说匹配了不下十次人皇，而我甚至没有上过紫段，而且游戏平衡一塌糊涂，这个版本来说，红处彻底废了，官方只看到了屠夫一挂可以处决人类，没看到人类一分钟可以亮两台机子，完全不考虑平衡，每次各种改动基本上只是通知一下，根本不会去测试就直接上线，导致游戏现在平衡非常糟糕，尤其是单边玩家，屠夫觉得人类亮机太快，人类觉得屠夫配件不平衡，于是导致两极化严重，而且游戏环境不怎么样，部分人类玩家非常喜欢嘲讽屠夫，国服，韩服美服比较严重（日服就不说了，一半都是中国人)，游戏里蹲起嘲讽，出了游戏还要骂两句，我是双边玩家，基本上有处决就会用，但是这个版本把红处改为两挂才可以处决（三挂必死），那我为什么还要带处决，处决这东西本来就是掌控节奏用的，现在把它改成这样，遇到车队不带处决人类会三跑甚至是四跑，如果碰到语音车这种情况会更严重，新手前期没有技能，上来排到高段位玩家吗，直接劝退，这个游戏就是乱改平衡，除非有人和你一起玩，否则慎入，单边玩家也慎入（单边指只玩人类或者屠夫）

Суть игры такова:
*Игра за убийцу - заходишь в лобби, видишь 4 Клодетки с фонариками, понимаешь что тебе P!zda, выходишь из игры, получаешь БАН, берешь Рин с наедом, делаешь -4, +ранг, +очки крови, +полезная инфа о твоей маме, папе, бабушке, и вообще твое место в жизни)
*Игра за выжившего - заходишь в игру, тебя сносит Буба, и показывает свое место обитания ( подвал ), провисев всю игру в подвале можно подумать о жизни, посмотреть телевизор, посмотреть на прекрасное лицо бубы, на выживших лежащих рядом с ним, ммммм, курорт 5 звезд, советую, не пожалеете) 
*Ну и на последок, кто из России, желаю вам удачи и успеха в этой прекрасной игре, где в каждой катке у тебя будет пинг 100+, и да, не удивляйся если ты уже бл*ть за 300 н*хер метров от маньяка а он вешает тебе в еб*ло, потом кивает показывая как он тебя переиграл в плане тактической игры.
*Мое мнение об игре, если бы разработчики не клали х*р на игру и слушали своих игроков, то игра обрела бы новые краски, 6.9/10 моя оценка к игре...
*Хотя нет, над подвалом разработчики постарались, респект.
